title: How to Make Pizza Dough Without Yeast

steps.title: Combine the flour, baking powder, and salt in a medium mixing bowl.
steps.content: Combine the flour, baking powder, and salt in a medium mixing bowl.

steps.title: Add the warm water and the oil.
steps.content: Add the warm water and the oil.

steps.title: Stir all ingredients together until the mixture forms a ball.
steps.content: Stir all ingredients together until the mixture forms a ball. (Add more water if the dough becomes too stiff.)

steps.title: Turn out the dough onto a floured cutting board and knead the ball of dough gently for a few minutes.
steps.content: Turn out the dough onto a floured cutting board and knead the ball of dough gently for a few minutes. The dough should be soft, but not sticky. Sprinkle a little flour on the dough if it is too sticky to knead.

steps.title: Spread the dough onto a pizza pan or a flat baking sheet.
steps.content: Spread the dough onto a pizza pan or a flat baking sheet. Smooth out the dough so that it is uniformly even.

steps.title: Remove pizza from oven and add desired toppings.
steps.content: Remove pizza from oven and add desired toppings.
